status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.summary: Android: Splash screen stretches when orientation modes are set to landscape in app.js

comments.body: Did you add landscape resources in the platform/android or Resources/android/images folder?

No, I didn't add anything to either of those folders.  Is it required?

Just as a note, this app works as described in the expected behavior on iOS.
Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress for a number of years. Please open a new ticket if there are any problems.
